channel.title: Hello there
channel.description:
What have all you guys been doing?
Been awhile since I've been here. :p

item.title: Hello there
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:32, topic:414588”][quote author=purestmage74 link=topic=516552.msg3750380#msg3750380 date=1315970709]

Lol stupit, it’s ok most people with 200 rep are assholes :’)
just post random crushal shit, ‘irritating others’, ‘newfags’

Way to just be an ass to 15% of the community. You realize we’re joking, right?

Oh i’m not buggin off of you he classed me as a ‘Newfag’ when honestly most of my day is spent here.
And just saying most people with 200 rep are random asses

@lil
Yea?
comes natural for that word to me to come out like that.
cru…cruuuuu…cruuuussshhhhaaaalllll…
[/quote]
Wow, this is irritating. Look up newfag. Infact, I’ll ACTUALLY help you do that. http://tinyurl.com/mqrb9n
It has nothing to do with ‘rep’ it has to do with how you refer to people and how long you’ve spent here on the forums. Trying to mooch up to some people that have been here for awhile, isn’t going to help you.[/quote]

Sheeet…
I’m looking at the word ‘newfag’ and thinking negative.
Kind of like being called a jackass, and the guys like 'OH HEY BRO, DID YOU KNOW JACKASS IS ANOTHER TERM FOR DONKEY?, YEEEAH MAN… I WAS JUST KIDDING.

So, really don’t care for the word sorry about it if it’s a legit word, im off this thread there’s my talking for tonight.

Read full topic

It has nothing to do with ‘rep’ it has to do with how you refer to people and how long you’ve spent here on the forums. Trying to mooch up to some people that have been here for awhile, isn’t going to help you.

item.title: Hello there
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:30, topic:414588”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=516552.msg3750377#msg3750377 date=1315970557]

Lol stupit, it’s ok most people with 200 rep are assholes :’)
just post random crushal shit, ‘irritating others’, ‘newfags’

Way to just be an ass to 15% of the community. You realize we’re joking, right?
[/quote]

Oh i’m not buggin off of you he classed me as a ‘Newfag’ when honestly most of my day is spent here.
And just saying most people with 200 rep are random asses[/quote]

I dunno what people mean by rep means nothing. 146 of my 200 rep was legitimately made through modeling, tutorials, and server contributions (although, it wasn’t much). The rest was from trolls and the occasional minecraft building. I’ve gotten over 5 +13s and only -1 since July for almost legitimate reasons too.

Read full topic
